body_html:
I am getting the following error in fresh virtual environment:

(pytorch_env) D:\Temp\pytorch-0.3.0-py36_0.3.0cu80>conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.


(pytorch_env) D:\Temp\pytorch-0.3.0-py36_0.3.0cu80>python
Python 3.6.2 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Jul 20 2017, 12:30:02) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32

Any ideas?

body:
I am getting the following error in fresh virtual environment:

```
(pytorch_env) D:\Temp\pytorch-0.3.0-py36_0.3.0cu80>conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.


(pytorch_env) D:\Temp\pytorch-0.3.0-py36_0.3.0cu80>python
Python 3.6.2 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Jul 20 2017, 12:30:02) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
```

Any ideas?
